refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in image. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Load an image and return a reference to it. Individual pixel values can then be accessed with imagegetpixel.

note.simpara: The image processing opcodes can only load png images

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iimagenum -- number assigned to the loaded image.
filename -- The filename of the image to load (should be a valid PNG image file).
